commit message:
Remove use of nested adapters in HomeDropdownListAdapter

Previously two adapters were used, one for regular view
and one for the dropdown view.  This consolidates them
into a single adapter that contains items for all the
orgs and the actions that display after the orgs.

This allows views to be reused and remove the ugliness
of deferring from one parent adapter to two different
child adapters depending on the position

Register listener from onActivityCreated

This will update the current org to have the
selection provider value if the view is destroyed
and recreated.
Store current org to instance state bundle
Only check new vs. previous organization ids once
Use application as context for invisible tab content View
Use single MessageDigest instance across all hash calls
Don't send null listener when scheduling item update
Add different asserts depending on platform
Add helper for getting number of orgs
